name.baseName: Coal Handling Point ; Bituminous coal and anthracite coal ; Bituminous coal and anthracite coal ; Underground synthetic mechanization mining ; greater than or equal to10 million t/a; NESPS2
煤炭装卸点 ; 烟煤和无烟煤 ; 烟煤和无烟煤 ; 井工综采 ; 大于等于1000万吨/年 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isDirect discharge，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time (hours/year)

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isDirect discharge，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time (hours/year)
technology.technologicalApplicability: 所描述的工业过程用于大规模地下开采烟煤和无烟煤，这些煤炭类型用于能源生产、冶金和作为工业化学品生产的前体。该过程适用于年产量大于或等于1000万吨的作业。此外，数据集包括旨在减少颗粒物污染（PM2.5 - PM10）的末端处理技术，例如喷雾减排和直接排放。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码06,三级代码61.0,四级代码610文件，在完整版文件中第19页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isSpray，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management80，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time (hours/year)
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是喷淋，其效率为80，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=喷淋设备运行时间（天/年）/企业正常运转天数（天/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
源文件中描述为为烟煤和无烟煤，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isDirect discharge，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time (hours/year)
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是直排，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=喷淋设备运行时间（天/年）/企业正常运转天数（天/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
